traditional_elegance_details: تجمع نيش أومي بين التصاميم الأصلية والنسيج الذي تم اختياره بدقة للتحدث على الفور بلغة الأناقة والفخامة والأزياء المتواضعة. تم تصميم كل قطعة لتكون الأفضل من نوعها مع جودة متميزة وتصاميم بدون الامثال  لها مخصصة للاحتفال بالنساء. الجذور في شغف الأزياء الراقية، يهدف  نيش أومي إلى تحقيق التطور لجعل كل يوم يوم الأكثر عصرية.
founder_shemi_desc: شيمي, هي الحالم بين الاثنين. انها آثار مرة أخرى بأحباب للملابس والأزياء إلى طفولتها وسنوات المراهقة. من ولاية كيرالا-الهند، أمضت بعض الوقت في تجربة الملابس التقليدية. إن الوَرَق مع الهدف الجماعي، والاستفادة من الأزياء الإسلامية، واكتشاف إمكاناتها على الصعيد العالمي، هو في الواقع حلم تحقيق بالنسبة لها. تجد الفرح في ابتسامة الرضا على عملائها.
founder_nisha_desc: نيشا، هي في الأصل كيرلية من الهند، هي بنت أعمالة متحمس تحركه مبادئ الإبداع والعمل الشاق. و هي تجد ارتياحاً هائلاً في العثور على الجدة في التصاميم والحداثة في الملابس. متحمس والإثارة لأنها تقدم، نيشا، هي بالتأكيدة تسترشد بقوة من قبل العاطفة للأزياء والتشويق في إدخال التصاميم الأصلية إلى السوق.
exclusive_store_desc: متجرنا الحصري في ...... هي وجهة مفضلة لجمع العباياة الفاخرة ويرتدي المصمم. بالإضافة إلى مجموعة أنيقة، يوفر المتجر راحة المصممين والموظفين الإناث لاحتياجاتك لتخصيص الزي الخاص بك. قم بزيارة لتجربة تسوق لا تشوبها شائبة أن يترك لك مع إضافات لا تعوض إلى خزانة الملابس الخاصة بك.
abaya_then_and_now_desc1: .عبايات أو رداء طويل ، يُعرف شعبياً باسم العباية ، يُشار إليه أيضًا باسم او ابا ، اباه ، كلها تمثل هذه الملابس اليومية التي تغطي الجسم بالكامل بسهولة.
abaya_then_and_now_desc2: .كانت ترتدي هذه الملابس في البداية من قبل النساء المسلمات في جميع أنحاء الشرق الأوسط ، ولكن الآن مع تزايد الطلب على العباية على مستوى العالم ، يرتديها غير المسلمين كأزياء راقية .  عادة ما تكون سوداء اللون ، والآن تأتي في أنماط مختلفة ، ومعظمها مطرز
origin_desc: عادة ما تبدأ المرأة المسلمة في ارتداء العبايات عند أول علامة على البلوغ. غالبًا ما يُعزى سبب العبايات إلى الاقتباس القرآني ،
origin_quote: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ قُلْ لِأَزْوَاجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَاءِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ يُدْنِينَ عَلَيْهِنَّ مِنْ جَلَابِيبِهِنَّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدْنَىٰ أَنْ يُعْرَفْنَ فَلَا يُؤْذَيْنَ ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَحِيمًا 0
origin_quote_desc: غالبًا ما يتم تقديم هذا الاقتباس كحجة لارتداء العبايات.
as_global_outfit_desc1: يجيئ العبايات بأشكال مختلفة وهي الآن منسوجة مع ملابس مختلفة. يمكن تزيينها بالخرز وتزيينها بقصوص وطبعات منمقة. ليس من غير المألوف العثور على العبايات بغطاء للرأس ، لكن الغالبية تعمل من الأكتاف إلى أسفل. توصف العبايات بالحجاب التقليدي. يمكن ارتداؤها جنبًا إلى جنب مع الملابس الإسلامية الأخرى ، مثل الحجاب أو النقاب. تختلف الأنماط عن المنطقة: بعض العبايات بها تطريز على قماش أسود بينما البعض الآخر ذو ألوان زاهية ولها أشكال مختلفة من الأعمال الفنية.
as_global_outfit_desc2: ازدهرت العباية المصممة في السنوات الأخيرة ، حيث ابتكرت العلامات التجارية الفاخرة مجموعات مخصصة للشرق الأوسط. يستكشف العديد من مصممي العبايات العرب أسبابًا أخرى ، بعيدًا عن الأسود الكلاسيكي ، والعبايات المعاصرة ذات الجبهات المفتوحة ، والأقمشة المنسوجة بظلال محايدة. بعضها مزين بخطوط وخرز لؤلؤي وتطريز زهري.
as_global_outfit_desc3: تمثل العبايات الآن شخصية وفخر وشعور المرأة الإماراتية بالموضة. لم تعد تقتصر على الرموز الدينية ، ولكنها تحمل أيضًا آثارًا ثقافية قوية يبدو أنها معترف بها والتي تفسر بحق استخدام الأزياء الإماراتية في جميع أنحاء العالم. أصبحت العباءة الآن زيًا لها مكانتها المستقلة وتوصل بيان أزياء قوي. تنقل هذه الرحلة عبر العصور ظهور اتجاهات الموضة في الشرق الأوسط مع مرور الوقت.
about_sleeves_desc1: في هذا المنشور ، دعنا نستكشف أنماط وأنواع العبايات المتوفرة. تتوفر العباية في العديد من الخامات والأنماط المختلفة وبتفاصيل متنوعة غالبًا ما نشعر بالحيرة من اختيار واحدة تناسبنا والمناسبة وخزانة ملابسنا.
about_sleeves_desc2: إليك محاولة لإبقائك على اطلاع حتى تصبح عملية اختيار ما يرغب فيه قلبك أسهل قليلاً بالنسبة لك.
about_sleeves_desc3: دعونا نقسمها إلى الأكمام. الأكمام جزء مهم من تفاصيل تصميمات العباية. يمكن أن يكون كم الجرس ، أو كم فضفاض ، عادي ، أو واحد يناسب ذراعك. سيساعدك فهم أنماط الأكمام على الاختيار الصحيح حسب المناسبة.
about_sleeves_desc4: كم الفراشة: كم واسع واسع يمتد من فتحة الذراع حتى المعصم ، هذا النمط يوفر الراحة والراحة. تمامًا كما يوحي الاسم ، تضيف هذه القطعة بالتأكيد مظهر الفراشة إلى الزي.
about_sleeves_desc5: الكم المنتفخ هو اتجاه دائم الخضرة ، حيث يبدأ الكم الفضفاض عند الكتف وضيق عند المعصم. لم يفت الأوان أبدًا للحصول على عباية بأكمام منفوخة لأنها تضيف مظهرًا كلاسيكيًا للغاية إلى خزانة ملابسك.
about_sleeves_desc6: كم الجرس هو الخيار الأكثر أناقة وتواضعًا ، خاصةً في الملابس الفضفاضة. تتميز العبايات بأكمام جرس بأكمام طويلة من الكوع إلى الكتف ثم تتسع حتى المعصم. هذا مرة أخرى هو خيار شعبي كلاسيكي.
about_sleeves_desc7: الأكمام المقيدة طويلة ومخيطة لتناسب المعصم مثل الكفة. غالبًا ما يتبع الكُم المُكبَّل تفاصيل الأزرار وأعمال الشريط وما إلى ذلك. تحظى أكمام الكفة بشعبية بين الصغار وتضيف التفاصيل التي تتم على الأكمام إلى الطلب على هذا النمط.
about_sleeves_desc8: الأكمام المتوهجة هي نمط الأكمام المفضل. إنها حديثة وأنيقة لأنها غالبًا ما يتم إبرازها بأعمال سرير جذابة أو أعمال تطريز.
about_sleeves_desc9: أنماط الأكمام الأخرى المطلوبة هي كم جناح الخفاش ، وغطاء اللوحة وما إلى ذلك. تأتي معظم أنماط الأكمام في أنماط مبتكرة وتفاصيل العمل.
about_sleeves_desc10: إضافة إلى تفاصيل الأكمام تضيف بالتأكيد الأناقة والأناقة إلى الزي. يفضل معظم الناس عمل الخرز أو الحجر لملابس المناسبات. ترتدي ملابس العمل في الغالب زخرفة خرزية أو تطريز أو أعمال حجرية معتدلة على الأكمام وتتميز العبايات اليومية بتفاصيل الأكمام وقص الأكمام والأكمام المطرزة وما إلى ذلك.
about_sleeves_desc11: في المرة القادمة ، لا تنسَ أن تتسوق نمط الأكمام المفضل لديك واحصل على نمط واحد لإضافة لمسة من الأناقة إلى خزانة ملابسك.
our_story_desc1: بدأت قصتنا في العام   2018، عندما نيشا و شمي، الذينا التقيا صدفة في الفجيرة، ارتبطا بحبهما للملابس والأناقة، ملهمينهما لإطلاق نيش اومي. وقد تضافرت صداقتهما وشغفهما مع الثقافة الإماراتية والتقاليد الإسلامية لتكين مجموعة فاخرة من العبايات. في فترة قصيرة من 4  الى 5 شهراً، فازة نيش اومي أقلاب مع حساسيتها المتواضعة والذوق للنوعها.
our_story_desc2: نيش اومي يستكشف الإبداع غير المستغلة والجماليات التي يمكن أن تضيف المزيد إلى هذه القطعة من الملابس. الهدف هو التقاط التراث، والجاذبية العالمية، والتواضع من خلال التفاصيل، والتخفيضات الجديدة، والأساليب. في رحلتهم لخلق اتجاه في الأزياء الإسلامية للمرأة، نيش اومي يترك معيارا من خلال كونها العلامة التجارية للمرأة الرائعة، من حيث الملكية، والإدارة، والعملاء.
privacy_policy_desc1.1: nishOmi (collectively, “us” or “we”) understand that your privacy is important to you. We are committed to respecting your privacy and protecting your personal data, which is any information that is capable of identifying you as an individual person, collected via all websites or apps that post a link to this Privacy Policy (collectively, “the Sites”). This Privacy Policy describes how we handle and protect your personal data in connection with the Sites, in our capacity as data controllers. Please see our
privacy_policy_desc1.2: for more information about our online terms and policies in general.
privacy_policy_1_desc1: nishOmi collects personal data on certain areas of the Sites when you register for nishOmi newsletters and alerts. The personal data collected varies across the Sites and may include information that you provide, such as your name and e-mail address. For instance, by registering for nishOmi newsletters or alerts, you agree to receive the correspondence to which you have subscribed at the e-mail address that you provided at registration. Only nishOmi or its agents will contact you using this e-mail address. We will send e-mails to this address related to your registration.
privacy_policy_1_desc2: We may also automatically collect information about the devices you use to interact with our Sites. The information we automatically collect may include IP address, device identifier, web browser, and browsing information collected through cookies, web beacons, pixels, clear gifs, and other similar technologies (collectively “Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies”) on our Sites. We may also automatically collect information about how you use the Sites, such as what you have searched for and viewed on the Sites. The information automatically collected will be associated with any personal data you have provided.
privacy_policy_2_desc1: The personal data we collect may be used where we have your specific consent to do so, or where nishOmi has a legitimate interest in or other legal basis for processing such information. In some situations, the collection of personal data may be required for the operation of the Sites or to provide certain services or products. nishOmi uses your personal data to fulfill your requests for information, personalize content that you view or receive on the Sites, evaluate and improve our services, distribute newsletters and alerts to you,analyze the Sites’ performance and functioning, publish your letters to the editor or comments,enforce our Terms & Conditions, comply with all applicable laws and corporate reporting obligations, enforce nishOmi’s agreements, and accomplish other purposes you may initiate or request. We may keep any of your personal data on file and use it to contact you.
privacy_policy_2_desc2: nishOmi may use first and third party Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies to manage our Sites and our services and collect analytics about how you use them. The information provided throughout this Privacy Policy about cookies also applies to these other tracking technologies. Our Sites do not collect personal data about your online activities over time and across third party websites or online services. Therefore, “do not track” signals transmitted from web browsers do not apply to our Sites, and we do not alter any of our data collection and use practices upon receipt of such a signal.
privacy_policy_subtitle3: Use of information collected via mobile devices
privacy_policy_3_desc1: In connection with our mobile applications, nishOmi may use third party service providers to analyze non-personally identifiable user activity to fix errors, monitor usage, and improve the performance of the mobile applications. For example, nishOmi receives reports on some of our mobile applications’ aggregate usage and browsing patterns, including information about the type of device used, articles accessed, and other events occurring within our apps. nishOmi also receives reports on certain errors occurring within mobile applications. None of these third party service providers gathers information in a manner intended to identify any particular user personally.
privacy_policy_subtitle4: Data recipients and international data transfers
privacy_policy_4_desc1: Personal data collected on the Sites may be transferred from time to time to nishOmi and their personnel across our global organization, as well as to our third party service providers located throughout the world, including in countries where the local law may grant you fewer rights than you have in your own country. Additionally, the Sites may be viewed and hosted by nishOmi and our third party service providers anywhere in the world. Where required by law, we have put in place legal mechanisms designed to ensure adequate data protection of your personal data that is processed by nishOmi and third- party service providers, including the transfer of your personal data to countries other than the one in which you reside. If you would like more information about these legal mechanisms, which may include the EU’s Standard Contractual Clauses, please contact us at the address below. By using any of the Sites and providing information on any of them, you voluntarily consent to such trans-border transfer and hosting of such information.
privacy_policy_4_desc2: nishOmi will not intentionally disclose or transfer (and will take reasonable steps to prevent the unauthorized or accidental disclosure of) your personal data to third parties without your consent, whether for such third parties’ own marketing purposes or otherwise, except as follows.nishOmi may provide access to your personal data to third party service providers engaged by nishOmi to provide services related to the Sites, provided that such third- party service providers will first agree to maintain the strict confidentiality of such information and provide the same level of data security as provided by nishOmi.
privacy_policy_4_desc3: We also may share your personal data with third party service providers who perform services and functions on our behalf to support our interactions with you, including, for example, processing recruitment materials, administering surveys or contests, or communicating with you. These third party service providers are not permitted to use or disclose your personal data except as necessary to perform services on our behalf or to comply with legal requirements.
privacy_policy_4_desc4: In addition, we may disclose information about you:
privacy_policy_4_info1: If we are required to do so by law or legal process;
privacy_policy_4_info2: To law enforcement authorities or other government officials;
privacy_policy_4_info3: When we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to prevent physical harm or financial loss or in connection with an investigation of suspected or actual illegal activity;
privacy_policy_4_info4: If disclosure is necessary to protect the vital interests of a person;
privacy_policy_4_info6: To protect our property, services and legal rights;
privacy_policy_4_info7: To prevent fraud against nishOmi, our subsidiaries, affiliates and/or business partners;
privacy_policy_4_info8: To support auditing, compliance, and corporate governance functions; or
privacy_policy_4_info9: To comply with any and all applicable laws.
privacy_policy_4_desc5: We maintain processes designed to ensure that any processing of personal data by third party service providers is consistent with this Privacy Policy and protects the confidentiality, availability, and integrity of your personal data. In addition, we may disclose or transfer your personal data in the event of a re-organization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, or other transfer or disposition of all or any portion of our business.
privacy_policy_5_desc1: You should be aware that whenever you publicly disclose information online, that information could be collected and used by others. nishOmi is not responsible for any action or policies of any third parties who collect information that users publicly disclose in any such forums on the Sites.
privacy_policy_6_desc1: nishOmi may provide links to third-party websites or information as a service to our users. If you use these links, you will leave the Sites. Such links do not constitute or imply an endorsement, sponsorship, or recommendation by nishOmi of the third party, the third- party website, or the information contained therein, and nishOmi shall not be responsible or liable for your use thereof. Such use shall be subject to the Terms & Conditions and privacy policies applicable to those sites.
privacy_policy_7_desc1: The Sites may allow you to sign into and associate your social network accounts including, but not limited to, Twitter and LinkedIn with nishOmi The Sites also may allow you to log in to a nishOmi account using certain social network account credentials.
privacy_policy_7_desc2: By associating your social network account with nishOmi or logging in to a nishOmi account using your social network account credentials, you give us permission to access information that you have made available in your public profile for that social network account. The information available in your public profile varies based on the social network and your settings, but may include your email address, real name, profile picture, gender, and location. We use the information we receive from your social network account in accordance with the social network’s Terms & Conditions and this Privacy Policy. Please refer to the privacy settings in your social network account for information about what data is shared with nishOmi and other connected applications and to manage the data that is shared through your account, including information about your activities using our Sites. If you would like to disconnect a social media account from us, refer to the settings of that social network account and its provider.
privacy_policy_8_desc1: nishOmi has implemented generally accepted standards of technology and operational security to protect personal data from loss, misuse, alteration, or destruction. Only authorized nishOmi personnel and third party service providers are provided access to personal data, and these employees and service providers are required to treat this information as confidential. Despite these precautions however, nishOmi cannot guarantee that unauthorized persons will not obtain access to your personal data.
privacy_policy_9_desc1: nishOmi retains personal data, as necessary, for the duration of the relevant business relationship. We may also retain personal data for longer than the duration of the business relationship should we need to retain it to protect ourselves against legal claims, use it for analysis or historical record-keeping, or comply with our information management policies and schedules. If you request that we delete your personal data, nishOmi will make reasonable attempts to delete all instances of the information in their entirety. For requests for access, corrections, or deletion, please refer to the “Your Rights” section of this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_10_desc1: The Sites are not designed for or directed at children 13 years of age or younger, and nishOmi does not intentionally collect or maintain personal data about anyone under this age.
privacy_policy_11_desc1.1: Where granted by local law, you may have the right to request access to the personal data that we have collected about you for the purposes of reviewing, modifying, or requesting deletion of the data. You may also have the right to request a copy of the personal data that we have collected about you and to have any inaccuracies in that data corrected. In certain circumstances, you may also request that we cease processing your personal data. If you would like to make a request to access, review, or correct the personal data we have collected about you, or to discuss how we process your personal data, please contact us at
privacy_policy_11_desc1.2: To help protect your privacy and security, we will take reasonable steps to verify your identity, such as requiring a password and user ID, before granting access to your personal data. We will make reasonable attempts to promptly investigate, comply with, or otherwise respond to your requests as may be required by applicable law. Different laws may prevent us from providing access to your personal data or otherwise fully complying with your request depending upon the circumstances and the request, such as for example, where producing your information may reveal the identity of someone else. We reserve the right to charge an appropriate fee for complying with your request where allowed by applicable law, and/or deny your requests where they may be manifestly unfounded, and/or excessive, or otherwise objectionable or unwarranted under applicable law. In addition, and where granted by local law, you have the legal right to lodge a complaint with a competent data protection authority. You may also unsubscribe from mailing lists or any registrations on any of the Sites. To do so, please either follow instructions on the page of the Site on which you have provided such information, subscribed or registered or contact us at the address provide at the bottom of this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_12_desc1.1: Pursuant to California Civil Code Section 1798.83(c)(2), nishOmi does not share your personal data with third parties for those third parties’ direct marketing use. If you are a California resident under the age of 18, and a registered user of any of the Sites where this Privacy Policy is posted, California Business and Professions Code Section 22581 permits you to request and obtain removal of content or information you have publicly posted. To make such a request, please send an email with a detailed description of the specific content or information to
privacy_policy_12_desc1.2: Please be aware that such a request does not ensure complete or comprehensive removal of the content or information you have posted and that there may be circumstances in which the law does not require or allow removal even if requested.
privacy_policy_13_desc1: By using the Sites, you consent to the collection, use, and storage of your personal data by us in the manner described in this Privacy Policy and elsewhere on the Sites. We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will alert you to any such changes by updating this Privacy Policy. If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy that increase our rights to use personal data that we have previously collected about you, we will obtain your consent either through an email to your registered email address or by prominently posting information about the changes on our Sites.
privacy_policy_14_desc1: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
terms_of_use_desc1: nishOmi (“nishOmi” or “we”) provides its content on nishOmi.com (the “Site”) subject to the following terms and conditions (the “Terms”). We may periodically change the Terms without prior notice, so please check back from time to time. These Terms were last updated on July 1, 2018. By accessing and using this Site, you agree to these Terms. For an explanation of nishOmi’s practices and policies related to the collection, use, and storage of our users’ information, please read our

Neither the Site Content nor functionality of the Site, may be copied, reproduced, modified, reverse engineered, altered (including the removal or disabling of any security or technological safeguards, disclaimers, or legends) uploaded, published, uploaded, posted, transmitted, or distributed in any way without our written permission, except for those uses specified in Section 3 – Use of site content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved.
terms_of_use_2_desc1: The trademarks, service marks, designs, and logos (collectively, the “Trademarks”) displayed on the Site are the registered and unregistered Trademarks of nishOmi and its licensors. You agree that, except as expressly permitted by us (e.g., through social media sharing tools provided on the Site) or by our licensors, where applicable, you will not refer to or attribute any information to nishOmi or its licensors in any public medium (e.g., press release, websites, or public social media) for advertising or promotion purposes, or for the purpose of informing or influencing any third party and that you will not use or reproduce any Trademark of, or imply any endorsement by or relationship with, nishOmi or its licensors.
terms_of_use_3_desc1: nishOmi hereby grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license for the term hereof to access and download, display, and print one copy of the Site Content on any single computer solely for your internal, business use, provided that you do not modify the Site Content in any way (including creating derivative works thereof), that you retain all copyright and other proprietary notices displayed on the Site Content, and that you otherwise comply with these Terms. our_story_draft: عبايات تعكس شخصية وفخر وحس الموضة للمرأة العربية التي ظهرت الآن لخلق مساحة خاصة بها على مستوى العالم. مستوحاة من هذه الجوانب ، يستكشف نيش اومي الإبداع والجماليات غير المستغلة التي يمكن أن تضيف المزيد إلى قطعة الملابس هذه. الهدف هو التقاط التراث والنداء العالمي والتواضع من خلال التفاصيل والتخفيضات والأساليب الجديدة.
footer_desc: تجمع نيش اومي بين التصميمات الأصلية والنسيج المختار بدقة للتحدث على الفور بلغة الأناقة والرفاهية والموضة المحتشمة.

success.order: شكرا لتقديم هذا الطلب. سنقوم بتوصيلك قريبًا وتسليم هذا المنتج إلى عنوانك.
success.show_interest: شكرا لاهتمامك بهذا المنتج. سنقوم بتوصيلك قريبًا لمعرفة المزيد عن اهتماماتك ومساعدتك في الشراء
